profileAlternative.name: David Dorrell
profileAlternative.headline: Director of Data Science
profileAlternative.summary: I am a multi-disciplinary data scientist with a strong knowledge of both quantitative and qualitative methods. I specialise in predictive modelling, risk assessment and the application of other advanced analytics approaches. I have strong track record in delivering projects that deliver new insight and make a real operational impact including operational MIS and performance management. I have strong communications skills and have delivered presentations at No. 10 and a World Bank Conference.
